subject: Clutch Pedal Broken
description_text:
Hello simsonn,

I recently received the Pro Ultra X pedals 3 piece as a gift for my birthday. The Package I was given only had 2 pedals - My grandmother was certain she bought 3 pedals. She is not tech savy at all and feels as if I’m ungrateful for her gift.

I wanted to reach out for some help on this issue - Thank you so much again for your time and consideration!

Best,
Kyle Barretto

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Barretto,   Please provide your order number, and I’ll check whether there was an error in the shipment.
